DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
This effect has not yet been included and is currently on my to-do list.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
For every 5 stacks of [#8b0000]Vicious you deal and take 1 extra damage.
Bully X: Gain X Vicious and debuff your enemies or force their actions.
Can only be applied to non-attacking enemies. NL Taunted enemies are forced to attack.
Can only be applied to attacking enemies. NL Intimidated enemies are forced to defend and gain Block equal to 10 plus half your Vicious.
Armor Piercing X: NL Enemies lose HP equal to X% their destroyed Block.
Rending X: NL Enemies take X% extra damage if they don't have block.
Continue attacking if the condition is fulfilled.
Evolving Cards specializing in Lacerate.
[#b7410e]Lacerated creatures lose HP at the start of their turn based on their Max HP.
[#b7410e]Kneecapped creatures lose HP based on their missing HP at the start of their turn for three turns. Counts as Lacerate.
[#b7410e]Nicked creatures lose HP based on their Max HP at the start of their turn for three turns. Counts as Lacerate.
Increase the power of all Fenrir cards by 1 whenever you fulfill the condition.
Cards specializing in deck cycling and against buffed enemies.
[#3a7ebf]Flash [#3a7ebf]X: Discard up to X cards. Bonuses per discard: NL 1+ Card: Gain 1 bonus damage. NL 2+ Cards: draw a card. NL X: Activate the extra effect.
[#3a7ebf]Power [#3a7ebf]Flash [#3a7ebf]X: Discard up to X cards. Bonuses per discard: NL 1+ Card: Gain 1 bonus damage. NL 2+ Cards: draw a card. NL X-1: Activate the effect once.

[#3a7ebf]Utility [#3a7ebf]Flash [#3a7ebf]X: Discard up to X cards. Doesn't draw. Bonuses per discard: NL Attack: Gain 1 bonus damage. NL Skill: Gain 3 block. NL 2 Powers: gain 1 Energy NL 2 Status/Curse: Draw 1 card.
Versatile cards specializing in Mana Burn and damage mitigation.
Creatures affected by [#3abfbe]Mana [#3abfbe]burn lose 2% Max HP per stack when casting buffs, debuffs and spells.
[#3abfbe]Ignite [#3abfbe]X: Trigger up to X stacks of target enemy's Mana Burn.
Chargeable cards specializing against enemies with Block and defensive powers.
Staggered creatures deal less and take more Damage. Leviathan cards inflict additional Stagger based on enemy Block.
Augment this card's effect if you have enough Charges. NL Increases by 1 at the end of your turn.
Cards specializing in [#80ca2d]Hunger and improving the player's HP.
Augment this card's effect at the cost of [#80ca2d]Hunger. NL [#80ca2d]Hunger Increases by 1 whenever you play a non-Revenant card.
[#80ca2d]Hunger bonus effects are disabled. NL Gain 2 Temporary HP while [#80ca2d]Sated.
If you kill the target before the turn ends, gain [#80ca2d]1 Max HP for every 20 current HP your target has, when applying this debuff. NL Doesn't work on minions.
Gain 1 Temp HP for every [#80ca2d]8 [#80ca2d](7) damage you deal. NL Heal for half that amount instead if you kill it.
Split Scissors X: Deal X Bonus damage if the last played card was Severed Scissors or Right/Left Half. NL Recombines to Severed Scissors when Right and Left Half are exhausted.
Remove all of your Legendary Weapon cards from your deck and gain a new Weapon's cards.
Return up to three cards from the bottom of your discard pile to your draw pile. NL Draw one card.
Reduces your #yRevolver shot count by 1. NL Requires Reloading when at 0.
